channel.title: Want your own personal page for your server?
channel.description:
Hi.
I know people like to advertise their server so I decided to make use of my website that I [b]never[/b] use. I'm offering you a chance to have your own page for your server with as much as info as you'd like. It would be like [i]www.kitnopodcast.com/servername[/i]. I used to do a podcast that I quit now. So now I have that domain with over 2gb of bandwidth. I'm giving back to the community by offering you this.
If you're interested please reply back with your MSN and I'll add you. You [b]must[/b] write out the code for your page (html) in a notepad and then send it to me. I'm not writing your pages for you. Also, I can host webclients for you too.
[b]THIS IS ALL FREE[/b].
~Kitno[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 04:05:45 PM[/size][hr]I guess no one.

item.title: Want your own personal page for your server?
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Hi.

I know people like to advertise their server so I decided to make use of my website that I never use. I’m offering you a chance to have your own page for your server with as much as info as you’d like. It would be like www.kitnopodcast.com/servername. I used to do a podcast that I quit now. So now I have that domain with over 2gb of bandwidth. I’m giving back to the community by offering you this.

If you’re interested please reply back with your MSN and I’ll add you. You must write out the code for your page (html) in a notepad and then send it to me. I’m not writing your pages for you. Also, I can host webclients for you too.

THIS IS ALL FREE.
